name: Thornmail
tooltip:
Thornmail

Cost: 2700
+60 Armor
+350 Health

UNIQUE Passive - Thorns: When struck by an attack, deal 10 (+ 10% bonus armor) magic damage to the attacker and, if they are a champion, inflict them with 40% Grievous Wounds for 2 seconds. Immobilizing enemy champions also inflicts them with 60% Grievous Wounds for 2 seconds.
